title: About Me
content: Hello! I'm a passionate Computer Engineer from Concepci√≥n, Chile. I hold a degree in Computer Engineering and have a strong background in software development, driven by my enthusiasm for technology and continuous learning. While Spanish is my native language, I am proficient in English and can comfortably use it in both personal and professional settings. I have extensive experience in various programming languages, including Python, Go, and JavaScript, along with their respective frameworks. My skills extend to working with APIs and databases, which I have applied in numerous professional and personal projects. My projects range from desktop applications to complex web services, showcasing my versatility and dedication to solving real-world problems through innovative solutions. I am always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills, whether through self-study or collaborative projects. My goal is to leverage my expertise to create impactful solutions that drive efficiency and innovation in any organization I am part of. Thank you for visiting my page. Feel free to explore my projects and connect with me if you have any questions or collaboration ideas.
